identificationModule.briefTitle: Retrospective Treatment Pattern Survey for the Patient With and Without History of Stroke
identificationModule.officialTitle: A Retrospective, Multi Centre, Non-interventional, Observational Study to Compare Treatment Pattern and Factors That Affect BP Control in Patients With and Without Stroke

descriptionModule.briefSummary: This study will compare hypertension treatment pattern of stroke patients with non-stroke patients receiving medical care from outpatient clinics at neurology specialty centers in Korea. It will evaluate target BP achievement rate in patients with stroke compared to patients without stroke and investigate factors affecting BP target goal efficacy in these patients.

armGroups.description: Hypertension patients with history of stroke
Hypertension patients without history of stroke

primaryOutcomes.measure: Blood pressure, History of stroke, Antihypertensive medication
primaryOutcomes.timeFrame: After collecting all Patient Record Form.

secondaryOutcomes.measure: Blood pressure, History of stroke, antihypertensive medication, Classification of stroke, Risk factors, Concomitant medication, etc.
secondaryOutcomes.timeFrame: After collecting all Patient Record Form.

eligibilityModule.eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Outpatients attending neurology specialty centers, either with or without history of stroke, receiving hypertension medication

Exclusion Criteria:

* Secondary hypertension patients
* Patients not receiving hypertension medication
eligibilityModule.studyPopulation: Hypertension outpatients coming to the Neurology Department
